ai_response.generated_message: Hey Allen, I'm so sorry for worrying you! Things have been extra hectic here with the village project and spotty internet. I really appreciate all your sweet messages checking in on me, it means more than you know. You're right, I've been totally drained lately, but reading your kind words helps. How's Mocha doing? And are you getting any good hikes in this weekend? Sending you a big virtual hug (and promise I'll reply faster now) ðŸ˜˜
